trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control that can be used to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項，可以用來裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否自動調整大小以顯示其全部內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項會調整大小以配合其內容。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出裝載的項目是否有透明背景。

trans-unit.source: The BackColorTransparent property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container.
trans-unit.target: BackColorTransparent 屬性可讓複製點陣圖，這讓裝載使用透明度透過主機容器的項目。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background.
trans-unit.target: 透過映像或背景漸層停駐項目時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the BackColorTransparent property is turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: 基於效能考量，BackColorTransparent 屬性已關閉的預設值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果裝載的項目有透明背景。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the BindingContextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 BindingContextChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property can be set to an active value to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>屬性可以設定為使用中的值，以啟用 IME 支援。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>項目，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>由<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Only one element can be hosted, but Child can have any number of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個項目可以裝載，但子系可以有任意數目的子項目。

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Click event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Click 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*>

trans-unit.target: 如需 ClientSizeChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於加入新控制項至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the ControlAdded event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ControlAdded 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>移除控制項

trans-unit.source: For more information about the ControlRemoved event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ControlRemoved 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: For a more information about the CursorChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 CursorChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DefaultSize property, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需預設大小屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Immediately frees any system resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 立即釋放所使用的任何系統資源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按兩下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DoubleClick event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DoubleClick 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於拖放作業完成。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DragDrop event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需拖放事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 發生於將物件拖曳至控制項的邊框。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DragEnter event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DragEnter 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 發生於將物件拖出控制項的界限。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DragLeave event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DragLeave 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當物件拖曳至控制項邊框上方時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the DragOver event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需拖曳經過時顯示事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 可讓<xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> modelessly 開啟從時正確地收到鍵盤訊息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Call the EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 EnableModelessKeyboardInterop 方法，以將所有轉送鍵盤訊息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]modelessly 開啟視窗。

trans-unit.source: The EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: EnableModelessKeyboardInterop 方法安裝中的訊息篩選器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]為基礎的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.
trans-unit.target: 非強制回應視窗是作用中時，篩選會轉送所有鍵盤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Modelessly 開啟的視窗。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: 發生於輸入控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Enter event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Enter 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否擁有輸入焦點。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果焦點在控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>屬性值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>

trans-unit.target: 如需 FontChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>屬性值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the ForeColorChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ForeColorChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> to provide correct layout behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫基底類別實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>提供正確的版面配置行為託管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*>

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 自訂大小區域[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: The computed by the control, given the constraints specified by proposedSize.
trans-unit.target: 計算控制項，指定所指定的條件約束 proposedSize 。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the GiveFeedback event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 GiveFeedback 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項取得焦點。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the GotFocus event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Exit 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 取得裝載之父容器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, which is the parent container for the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: 主機容器是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，這是主控項目的父容器。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在裝載容器永遠是根目錄的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目階層架構。

trans-unit.source: To access the parent of the hosted element, access HostContainer directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取託管的元素的父系，直接存取 HostContainer。

trans-unit.source: The parent container.
trans-unit.target: 父容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的顯示需要重新繪製時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Invalidated event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Invalidated 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: 可確保所有的 WM_CHAR 按鍵訊息會轉送至裝載的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control processes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目不會處理`charCode`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>控制處理與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: The character to forward.
trans-unit.target: 要轉送的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnEnabledChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnEnabledChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnGotFocus method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 OnGotFocus 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnHandleCreated method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 OnHandleCreated 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnLeave method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 OnLeave 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementation of the OnPaint method forwards to the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>OnPaint 方法實作會將轉送至基底類別實作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 繪製控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP.
trans-unit.target: OnPaintBackground 方法會繪製到幕後 HBITMAP 父控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency.
trans-unit.target: 此點陣圖中裝載的項目背景以用於支援透明度。

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the control to paint.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> ，其中包含要繪製的控制項的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Renders the control using the provided <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將使用提供的控制項呈現<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*> that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed and requires translation.
trans-unit.target: 已變更且需要轉譯的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the OnVisibleChanged method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 OnVisibleChanged 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項的邊框間距變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PaddingChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 PaddingChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>重繪控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this event adds event handlers to the base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的實作會將事件處理常式的基底<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>事件焦點位於這個控制項上時按下按鍵時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the PreviewKeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 PreviewKeyDown 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: 處理命令按鍵，確保裝載的項目有機會處理命令之前一般[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]處理。

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引鍵的訊息不會處理由主控[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，將它轉寄向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]類別階層處理。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，表示要處理的視窗訊息的參考所傳遞。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values representing the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>數值，代表要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]捷徑金鑰; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: 處理助憶鍵字元，確保裝載的項目有機會處理一般之前的助憶鍵[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]處理。

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引鍵的訊息不會處理由主控[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，將它轉寄向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]類別階層處理。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]捷徑金鑰; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性對應，以決定如何設定上的屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>控制影響主控[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技術有兩個類似但不同屬性的模型。

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *屬性對應*支援兩種架構之間的互通性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"> </xref>對應<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref>至上主控的屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 發生於拖放作業，讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the QueryContinueDrag event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 QueryContinueDrag 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項調整大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Resize event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需調整大小事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>屬性值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the RightToLeftChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 RightToLeftChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Scales the parent container and the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: 縮放父容器和裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]控制項。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: X 軸的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Y 軸的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: 啟動裝載的項目。

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: 選取的方法就會啟動裝載的項目。

trans-unit.source: If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝載的多個項目存在，第一個或最後一個元素就會啟動，取決於`directed`和`forward`參數。

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method do not traverse the hosted elements.
trans-unit.target: 重複呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>方法不會周遊託管的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select subsequent elements, call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取後續項目，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將轉送 索引標籤中的索引鍵[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指定要選取; 控制項的方向否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在定位順序中向前移動<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>定位順序中向後移動。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>屬性值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the SizeChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關在 SizeChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>屬性值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the TextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 TextChanged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the WndProc method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需 WndProc 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A message to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理訊息。
